org.cloudfoundry.client.lib

类 SocketDestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudfoundry.client.lib.SocketDestHelper

  • public class SocketDestHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Byteman helper which rejects Sockets on non jetty threads that do not target the local http proxy. Calls to this class are dynamically injected into JDK java.net.Socket bytecode by byteman.

    • 构造器概要
